content.question: In the fourteenth paragraph, Matilda’s mother’s disclosure that “I didn’t know if I was looking at a bad man or a man who loved me” provokes what response from her daughter?

choices.label: Matilda concludes that her mother is lying.
Matilda feels even more confusion about her past.
Matilda craves more information about her father.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
